sbp.client.drivers.pyftdi_driver module¶

class sbp.client.drivers.pyftdi_driver.PyFTDIDriver(baud)[source]¶

Bases: sbp.client.drivers.base_driver.BaseDriver

The PyFTDIDriver class reads SBP messages from a serial port using the pyftdi driver.

port
: string
Path to port to read SBP messages from.
baud
: int
Baud rate of serial port.
